hero.name: Zeynep Behşi
hero.tagline: Data Scientist | AI Researcher | Automation Architect
hero.keywords: LLM & AI Agents  ·  Graph ML  ·  Machine Learning  ·  Artificial Intelligence  ·  Workflow Automation  ·  Business Intelligence

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a Data Scientist with a multidisciplinary background that bridges marketing strategy, applied research, and intelligent automation. My career started in marketing, where I spent two years designing data-driven campaigns and building analytical frameworks for business decision-making — an experience that shaped how I approach every technical problem: with the end business impact in mind.
about.p2: Published researcher with four conference papers on graph-based fraud detection (ICMLT 2026, UBMK 2025, SIU 2025). Currently focused on building autonomous AI agent systems and intelligent workflow pipelines powered by LLMs.
about.p3: I am also an AI educator. I design training programs in machine learning, Python, and data science, and I offer a proprietary curriculum focused on mastering AI-era skills — teaching professionals not just how to code, but how to learn and grow strategically with AI. I provide one-on-one mentorship and project consulting for career transitions into data science.

graphML.title: Graph ML & Fraud Detection
graphML.description: Designing graph neural network architectures and applying graph theory to detect sophisticated fraud patterns in financial systems. Published researcher with four accepted papers at international and IEEE-indexed conferences.
graphML.keywords: GNN · Heterogeneous Graphs · NetworkX · PyTorch · Memgraph

aiAgents.title: AI Agents & LLMs
aiAgents.description: Building autonomous AI agent systems that reason, plan, and execute complex multi-step tasks. Designing LLM-powered solutions that go beyond simple chatbots — creating intelligent systems capable of decision-making, tool use, and self-correction.
aiAgents.keywords: LangChain · LLM Orchestration · RAG · Tool-Use Agents · Prompt Engineering

automation.title: Intelligent Workflow Automation
automation.description: Transforming manual business processes into AI-driven automated pipelines. From data collection and processing to decision logic and reporting — building systems that reduce operational overhead and scale intelligently.
automation.keywords: Process Automation · Pipeline Orchestration · API Integration · AI-Driven Workflows

timeSeries.title: Business Intelligence
timeSeries.description: Developing forecasting models and analytical dashboards that translate raw data into strategic business decisions. Leveraging a marketing analytics background to bridge the gap between technical modeling and actionable business insights.
timeSeries.keywords: Forecasting · Predictive Analytics · Data-Driven Strategy · Dashboard Design

training.title: Training & Mentorship
training.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of data professionals
training.intro: I offer specialized training programs and one-on-one mentorship for individuals building careers in data science or looking to integrate AI into their professional toolkit. My approach combines rigorous technical training with strategic thinking about how to learn and grow effectively in the AI era.
training.sideDesc: AI-powered courses and mentorship programs for data science professionals. Available as individual sessions, group classes, or one-on-one consulting — designed to accelerate your AI-era career.

ds.title: Data Science Fundamentals
ds.description: Comprehensive training in Python, statistics, ML, and project development — designed for career changers and aspiring data scientists building from the ground up.

ml.title: Machine Learning & Deep Learning
ml.description: Intermediate to advanced program covering supervised/unsupervised learning, neural networks, model evaluation, and deployment with hands-on projects.

ai.title: AI-Powered Learning Program
ai.description: A proprietary curriculum designed to build the critical skills for the AI era. Master how to leverage AI tools strategically for accelerated professional development and continuous learning.

career.title: Career & Project Consulting
career.description: One-on-one mentorship for career transitions into data science, portfolio development, interview preparation, and hands-on guidance for integrating ML into professional workflows.

rag.title: AI Agents & RAG Systems
rag.description: Hands-on program covering autonomous AI agent architectures and Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines. Learn to build production-ready systems that reason, retrieve, and act — using LangChain, vector databases, and tool-use frameworks.

stats.title: Statistics for Data Science
stats.description: Foundational and applied statistics program covering probability theory, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, and Bayesian thinking — designed to build rigorous analytical reasoning for data science practice.

llm.title: LLM & Generative AI
llm.description: Practical program on large language models and generative AI applications. From API integration and prompt engineering to fine-tuning and evaluation — learn to build intelligent LLM-powered products.
